name: Fargorunner
review: Great laptop. Highly recommended. Light. Thin great video. Fast. I believe they are selling this product for a great price in order to gain market share and confidence because it's definitely worth more money. I love it

name: gloria navedo
review: At first this laptop is plain Jane. Once updated and software added it becomes a powerful machine. I'm doing stuff that usually would require a $700 or more laptop. From gaming to communication for sure the poor man's laptop. This laptop is more advance than what you think. Love the Xbox companion console.

name: Brad F.
review: This lop top exceeded expectation, it is very light, picture quality excellent and super easy to set up It was delivered very quickly and so far I have no complain.

name: Patrick Delaney
review: Surprisingly good quality build. For less than 400 bucks you get 8 gigs of RAM 256 SSD and the high quality screen that I've only seen on expensive laptops. The saturation was a little high and I had to lower it, but this laptop is a no-brainer. I would definitely recommend it to anyone on a budget.

name: Olivia.
review: So far this laptop is very nice and smooth, its pretty fast easy to set up as well i like it and the screen is nice and big to very sleek looking. Not bad for the price at all !

name: Emma.
review: After a few months the contact for the hearing aids no longer works and nobody answers, they have no contact with the seller and I am frustrated, because I lost the money and more because I lose what I paid for the programs added to the computer, and nobody answers me that's why.
